alert.note: Alert for Emanuel; Johnson; Montgomery; Toombs; Treutlen; Wheeler (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 08 at 6:44PM EDT until August 08 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Toombs County in southeastern Georgia... Southwestern Emanuel County in east central Georgia... Treutlen County in east central Georgia... South central Johnson County in east central Georgia... Northern Wheeler County in central Georgia... Montgomery County in central Georgia... * Until 730 PM EDT. * At 644 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Scott to near Lothair to near Landsburg, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Swainsboro, Lyons, Soperton, Alamo, Mount Vernon, Vidalia, Glenwood, Adrian, Uvalda, Stillmore, Oak Park, Ailey, Higgston, Santa Claus, Alston, Nunez, Tarrytown, Ohoopee, New Branch, and Lothair. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.

area.areaDesc: Emanuel; Johnson; Montgomery; Toombs; Treutlen; Wheeler
